name: D'Lischka Holiday Crate - only 2 left!
description:
Perfect for the holidays! The D'Lischka crate holds three large classic jars (Razzle Heart, Minty Bloom and Hazel Ace)
A small chalk board is attached to the front of the crate, which let's you customize it depending on the event.  
Crate size: 11in x 5.5in x 4in
(chalk included)

Each jar holds thirty-six pastries of one flavor, including
BOTH dark and white chocolate toppings. We are happy to
accommodate orders that request only ONE kind of chocolate topping. When placing your order, please indicate your special request. Our quality jars have a tamper-proof seal that keeps unopened pastries fresh for one month. Please enjoy within two weeks of opening.
